locations.title: Melrose Resort
locations.description: Set on the picturesque Daufuskie Island, this 680 acre-property features an eighteen-hole Jack Nicklaus Signature golf course, beach-club with three pools, wellness studio, equestrian centre, and oceanfront restaurant and bar.

locations.title: Daufuskie Marina
locations.description: The Daufuskie Island Landing is the main port of arrival for all guest, members and islanders It includes commercial dock facilities on the Intracoastal Waterway with a 2,600 square foot welcome center, 60 wet slips and ample land for expansion.

locations.title: Palmetto Bay Marina
locations.description: Palmetto Bay is a full-service marina and retail center with 13,000 SF of retail, 140 wet slips and yacht center. Palmetto Bay is the largest marina on Hilton Head and makes a great front door for Daufuskie Island.
